game.name: Lesomor
game.shortDescription: Become Tsarevich Ivan, forced to forge atomic weapons in a fairy‑tale world. Otherwise you won’t stand a chance against foreign monsters and formidable warrior‑maidens on your path to the Princess of the Dead, Lady Yaga… And what you choose to do with her is entirely up to you.
